website_summaries.verdict: Low priced ski goggles that still manage to maintain comfort and safety.
pros: Great pair of goggles for the price
Works surprisingly well across all light and weather conditions
Nice large frame that fits comfortably over glasses
Comes with a protective case and bag
cons: May feel cheaply made to some
Anti-fogging coat wears off the lens pretty quickly

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely over glasses
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair purchased. Last year my son, who wears glasses, worked at a ski resort and I purchased the Gonex Oversized Ski Googles because they are over sized and fit over glasses, which are hard to find. Unfortunately his apartment was destroyed in a fire in the fall and the googles were in the apartment. He, again, is working at the ski resort and needed another pair. He wanted the same ones. I went on Amazon to "my orders" and luckily these were still in stock! He loves these glasses and I love Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: kjsPA

customer_reviews.title: True over-the-glasses goggles
customer_reviews.text: These OTG goggles really do fit comfortably over my glasses because there's a cutout in the foam on either side to accommodate the bows. Other brands I've tried say they're designed to wear over glasses, but the foam pressing against the bows makes them uncomfortable. These Gonex goggles also feature good ventilation, which keeps them from fogging up in very cold weather. I love wearing them for snow blowing. The hard case for storage is a welcome addition, too. The only problem I have with the goggles is that where the lens is glued to the frame, it looks a bit messy. Other than that, I'm quite satisfied with these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: fit me well
customer_reviews.text: This pair fits me well. I have large face with prescription glasses. The frame is large enough to accommodate my wide glasses. The foam has cut-outs at both side to even better fit my glasses. I wish there are options for higher VLT lenses. I didn't like the orange frame/orange lens.
customer_reviews.author: York S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful for Snow Blowing!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a hard time using my snowblower (an important piece of equipment here in Minnesota!), because as the snow was being thrown out the chute, some of it was blowing back into my face and into my eyes. This was painful. I bought a balaclava helmet (also from Amazon) and these ski goggles to create a perfect seal for my face. I still had plenty of room to breathe. I am bullet proof! I also really like the hard case for the goggles. Highly recommended for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: JW Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Super wide peripheral
customer_reviews.text: Good performance, no fog in Colorado mts. Just right for sunny hrs, before 2pm. After 2pm, the 40% light transmittnace level might be more appropriate for cloudy lower light condition. 4 star bc there’s a minor problem with the two notches they carved out (located near the band) for people that would wear glasses, causing frigid wind to come in during chair lift ride. I taped it and it’s fine after. Perform much better than some of my higher price ones. I’m pretty new to snowboarding, ride probably 20days in Colorado in my life. Hang out on blue trails mainly. I bought this one and the orange one (45% light pass thru), too
customer_reviews.author: Lam Tran

customer_reviews.title: perfect mirrored goggles
customer_reviews.text: (I'm​ on the left of the picture wearing these goggles) I used to own a pair of Anon goggles but those got old so instead of buying another super expensive pair of goggles I decided to try these out instead. These are perfect! They don't fog or scratch easily. The box comes with a hard goggles case plus a small silk-like zip tie bag to put your goggles in. THEY ARE MIRRORED! When ordering, I couldn't find out whether or not these were definitively mirrored but I can reassure you that yes, these are mirrored and they work great as a substitute for overpriced brand name goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for wearing over eyeglasses
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing eyeglasses, and so far found most ski goggles, even otg ones, very uncomfortable. These Gonex otg ski glasses are oversized and highly recommended for wearing over glasses. At $20 they are much better than comparable ones bought for over $60.
customer_reviews.author: YARIE

customer_reviews.title: didn't dig and fit over my glasses comfortably. I have yet to find a google that ...
customer_reviews.text: Took these to brekenridge for the their first run. Worked well, didn't dig and fit over my glasses comfortably. I have yet to find a google that prevents my glasses from fogging 100% of the time, but these did a much better job than most. I used an anti-fog cloth on my lenses and stayed fog free most of the time. However, I had to keep my mouth exposed the majority of the time otherwise my breath would funnel straight into my lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory LaCelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for our ski trip to Breckenridge. They fit well and never fogged up during the day. The temperature was about 15-16 degrees the entire day of skiing, so I can't say they won't fog up as the temperatures get warmer, but for the price, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I could not find any others that really fit over my glasses. People were making a little fun of me because I looked a bit funny with them on. But they did what they were supposed to do and ai am do glad I got them!
customer_reviews.author: NOLA couple

customer_reviews.title: Best Goggles For the Price
customer_reviews.text: These goggles work great for snowboarding and skiing purposes. They provide a wide range of view and does not block your peripheral vision. They are well ventilated and do not fog up even when used in conjunction with a ski mask. I have the black iridium ones which are perfect for any type of day. The foam used for padding is comfortable enough to last the whole day on your face. All in all, this is a great product for the price. It even comes with a hard case, a bag, and a wiping cloth for the lense.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Chen

customer_reviews.title: These fit fine and are made very well
customer_reviews.text: These were a last minute buy when I was packing for a Colorado trip where I was going snow mobiling and I noticed my old goggles had broken. I know what they cost on the mountain so I decided to try here first. These fit fine and are made very well, as good as you get in the ski shops at half the cost. I love them and they worked GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: timOBX

customer_reviews.title: Good OTG feature
customer_reviews.text: I loved how they fit right over my glasses perfectly! My glasses are about 5.5 inches wide and the height is about 1.5 inches. I bought a different brand that claimed to be OTG but did not do so. Anyways, they fit very comfortably. The goggles fogged ever so slightly after a long sweaty, stretch down the slopes. Other than that I’d highly recommended them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Fogged up constantly
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for over glasses, but fogged up constantly in 30 weather. Skied most of the day with them more on my helmet than on my face. Definitely sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: David  Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Good- These goggles work great in most conditions. I've worn them in all conditions, and haven't had to switch to goggles with different lenses while my friends all have. Bad- The goggles don't fit perfectly with most helmets, and have a bit of a gap, but it's not a deal breaker. They also have a very strange smell that persists, which is probably from some part of the manufacturing. Works in bright, slightly dark, and flat light conditions. Overall, these are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Look.....Pretty amazing quality and nice looking goggle
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today, the quality and everything looks pretty amazing for its price. I haven't tested it yet, will do this weekend. It is very comfortable even wearing my glasses inside it is still fit perfectly! Although just hate that my helmet did not support this goggle, I got a huge gap in my forehead area...Kinda suck but other than that everything is good. Would recommend this product for anyone who looking for an affordable, good quality snowboard goggle :)
customer_reviews.author: Leah N

customer_reviews.title: Glasses compatible!
customer_reviews.text: The included bag and case are really nice, big, but nice. No problems with these goggles, definitely recommend if you wear glasses! Of course look for something darker if you don't have prescription sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: mikebw

customer_reviews.title: Overall very very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: works really well, it has cutouts on either side to accomodate larger eye glasses. I wore my sunglasses inside for the polarizing effect then wore this goggle over it. Worked REALLY WELL! The added benefit is the cutout allows some air exchange so it rarely fogs up and even if it did, once you ski it just dissipates. Overall very very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: CoopaPple

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit very comfortably over glasses and without. Definitely looks cool on, as the lens looks likes a mirror and reflects everything. Anti fog worked well for these goggles. I did manage to drop them on wood one time, and the outer lens popped out on one side, but was simple enough to pop back in. Overall these goggles are amazing and come with a great carrying case and a huge microfiber cleaning cloth
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Anti-fog goggles that sometimes fog
customer_reviews.text: They sometimes fog, but not always. If there was less fogging I would have given another star. They do help protect the eyes and cut down glare a lot so I'll continue to use them. Just disappointed that they fog up sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having my goggles compress my eyeglasses into my face while I ski, so I bought these since they looked oversized. And they did not disappoint! They were comfortable the entire trip. They didn’t fog up and kept out the glare. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking and easily visible googles. When the sun starts going down I have to put on my glasses and these fit right over them. The 21% shades on these actually make it hard to see at night time, like wearing sunglasses - I would get a second pair with clear lenses to wear when the sun goes down.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Garrity

customer_reviews.title: A steal
customer_reviews.text: I was SO skeptical of buying these because my boyfriend advised against buying non-name brand goggles. But, I’m vain and I wanted cooler looking goggles for an upcoming ski trip, and I took the risk of ordering these. Surprisingly, they fit great with glasses, don’t fog, and have made it through a couple trips skiing. So far I’m so happy with this purchase and will not be dropping $100+ on goggles ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for glasses wearers
customer_reviews.text: Great ski goggles with a really good mirrored effect on the lens.
customer_reviews.author: mZED

customer_reviews.title: Great for Folks wear Spectacles.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this pair of ski goggles for a few years now for skiing and snowboarding. The goggles fit most helmets and I even used it for snowmobiling in Svalbard. It held up pretty well and does not fog up like some of the other ski goggles I have used. This is also designed for people wearing spectacles and it was pretty comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Xin Li

customer_reviews.title: It’s not matte as it shows here...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, but my son likes it. Probably just being nice though. It’s shiny not matte like I thought it was displayed. Very spacious and roomy to fit around glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: WARNING:  NOT MATTE BLACK LIKE PICS
customer_reviews.text: These are nice glasses, but I feel like I got taken. They are displayed as being matte black, but are not at all. They are just regular glossy lenses. The look of the glasses (matte finish) is the reason I picked these glasses. I'll be sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: LouHugh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for first time, slightly large
customer_reviews.text: Wanted AFFORDABLE over the glasses (OTG) goggle for my first time skiing. These delivered. Large field of view, stayed fog free, no forehead gap. The black/black version is definitely a dark lens, but I could see fine even on a cloudy afternoon in light snow. Hardest part was reading my phone. Only complaint is a picky one about the size. These are so big they rested against my nostrils and pushed them in a bit, reducing my breathing some. Probably unique to everyone's face shape, and a helmet with a slightly higher crown could probably fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from recent snowboarding trip and these goggles were perfect. Foam kept all snow out even on heavy snow days. Sun glare was non existent and great even on cloudy days.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find a COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find a COMFORTABLE, reasonably priced over-the-glasses sized goggle. Wish they came with a totally clear lens for night use, but the 41% is functional.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Functionally great, Form lacking
customer_reviews.text: The finish on the goggles looks nothing like the amazing matte silver/grey in the picture, it is a normal tinted black like a pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Gonex OTG Ski Goggles: Good product. As described. Fast shipping. No CONs.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. As described. Fast shipping. No CONs so far. Working good with glasses also.
customer_reviews.author: UncleJ

customer_reviews.title: Great case for storage
customer_reviews.text: They truly do fit over existing prescription glasses. They are very lightweight but large. Great case for storage. Will be trying them out soon to see if they fog up or are uncomfortable while wearing. I'll re-post if there is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenS

customer_reviews.title: BEST bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: ive spent an embarassing amount of $$$ on brand name goggles. not only do i get compliments all over the mountain, but i have yet to have an issue with fogging up. only wish they made low light/alternative lenses sold separately
customer_reviews.author: castlepotter

customer_reviews.title: Over the Glass Goggles
customer_reviews.text: good quality product , quick ship, A+ would deal with again! fits well over the Glasses!
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother. I'll update my review once she actually gets a chance to wear these on the slopes, but so far she loves them. They are differently shaped than the picture (we bought silver) I received this product at a promotional price in exchange for a review.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles for the price. Fit over the glasses as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: They look awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: They were packaged well - nice ventilation holes on the top. Came with nice case, bag and lens cloth. They have a lot of padding and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 3

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!!!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it comes with a case is freakin awsome. It also comes with a carrying pouch and a lens cleaner. What a deal. Fits good. Looks good. Im excited to get this on and tested when I visit Banff in three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Derriksss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So good for the price. Anti fog worked great. Love the size of these!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Guy

customer_reviews.title: goggles
customer_reviews.text: I use them to mow the yard to keep out dust in the eyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he said it was uncomfortable for the first time he used it but after that it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.text: bought this to my friend, he said it was uncomfortable for the first time he used it but after that it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: KaKa

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles
customer_reviews.text: The goggles I received are not as displayed here, but I was only slightly disappointed with this. They are the same goggles but all black with a rainbow lens, not all rainbow-colored. Compared to more expensive goggles, they feel somewhat less solid, but this does not seem to affect their performance. There are cutouts in the foam to fit glasses; I have no trouble fitting mine. Though, if it's windy, the gap leaves room for cold air to sneak in. All in all, I'm satisfied with this purchase, especially because I did not have to pay upwards of $100 for decent goggles. Thanks, Gonex. Gratefully, Devin
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Got some snow inside the first time I used them, went to wipe it out and the whole inside of the lens got scratched up. Completely destroyed. User error, maybe, but have never had this issue with so called “cheap” goggles. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles - they didn't fog up at all, good peripheral vision; good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Radu Florian

customer_reviews.title: The frame is a bit large but it's nice to be able to see side to side without ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but the ski season is coming fast and can't wait to try them out. The lens are well constructed and very clear. The frame is a bit large but it's nice to be able to see side to side without turning my head which is the main reason for purchasing these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, comfortable, well performing, i will be buying another set for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and are comfortable. Couldn't ask for more
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear over my glasses for snowblowing. They fit well, don't fog, and are comfortable. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, and fit over my glasses perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Arlington

customer_reviews.title: but they do look pretty cool still and light up the surroundings better than ...
customer_reviews.text: They aren't the most sleek design ever, but they do look pretty cool still and light up the surroundings better than any color lens I've used. EVEN SMITHS!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great for low light
customer_reviews.text: These are great in low visibility/foggy conditions. Highly recommend these?
customer_reviews.author: KB-Boise

customer_reviews.title: Your friends can look at themselves in the fun house reflection
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are huge! I love it! And you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, wore them for 3 days in sub-zero ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, wore them for 3 days in sub-zero white outs. Great visibility. Fit perfectly with the helmet I rented. All my friends thought they looked dope too.
customer_reviews.author: Chrimbus McDonalds

customer_reviews.title: feels real good and has good wide viewing as I have only ...
customer_reviews.text: feels real good and has good wide viewing as I have only one eye so the more open the better
customer_reviews.author: thomas w.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my glasses
customer_reviews.text: Fits my rather large prescription glasses very well. I wouldn’t recommend to those who don’t wear prescription though, the giant sphereical lens can be too far away from face for some people, and it’s just bulkier, “oversized” indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: they scratch kind of easy too.
customer_reviews.text: Decent goggles, anti fog lasted one day, but still used them most of the season, they scratch kind of easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured! Didn't fog up in below zero temperatures! Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: NClay4

customer_reviews.title: Awesome steal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Worked over glasses and great overall product Would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Shoptastic Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wide Angle
customer_reviews.text: awesome!! love the way it fits glasses. fits snug with cushion that breathes and doesn't constrict.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are just as good as my girlfriends $100 Oakley’s. Never fogged and kept me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goggles! Look super expensive!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are awesome! Great visibility and great quality! They look super expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look mate silver in the picture, but they are actual glossy silver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but not great quality or performance.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are made with a double lens which fogs up easily and is difficult to clear. The inner lens is pretty distorted and scratched easily. It looks like they spot melted the inner lens to the frame during assembly which is what distorted the lens. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Huntzinger Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly and comfortably sit over my glasses and no fog, used them a few times so far would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Anyonomus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Never fogged
customer_reviews.text: Was able to use these goggles this past weekend in Breckenridge. Awesome product. Never fogged, crystal clear view. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Good anti-fog, Decent peripheral angle. Strap fits around my size L head and helmet, but in biggest setting. It's not to tight though, so it fits but barely. Good buy. I don't think they're swappable lens tho which is weak.
customer_reviews.author: James F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Major value for the price. I wear larger prescription glasses and these fit over them without any problems. Very little fogging issues too. Can’t beat these army this price.
customer_reviews.author: 72Twenty

customer_reviews.title: I FEEL SO COOL IN THIS GOGGLES
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles I could've ever ordered. I couldn't be happier. From the case and the cleaning cloth(which are amazing as well) to the goggles, everything is just absolutely flawless. Even the straps. I think everything is absolutely PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Ibiza

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I’ve used them four times so far and had no fogging issues across the spectrum of weather we’ve had the last month in Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Loved these goggles. Interchangeable lenses make it easy to swap in and out
customer_reviews.author: Carlos`

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and allowed me to wear my glasses, however the reflective laminate flakes off pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with these OTG goggles!! Consider getting a yello/clear lense for night skiing. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice versatile sense. fits easily over glasses and neatly under smith camber helmet. top notch.
customer_reviews.author: ape

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with helmets
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and I hate to part with them, but the helmet incompatibility is key.
customer_reviews.author: MedCityMoto

customer_reviews.title: They stick out off your face pretty far but looks good when you’re wearing a helmet
customer_reviews.text: Very much worth it for the price. They stick out off your face pretty far but looks good when you’re wearing a helmet
customer_reviews.author: Evan Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are alright but I didn't love them. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L.

customer_reviews.title: These things are crazy nice. Just dropped $150 on a pair of Smith ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are crazy nice. Just dropped $150 on a pair of Smith googles and wanted to see if you really get what you pay for. I can't tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Rose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and didn’t fog up and they are super clear and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very reflective, which is cool
customer_reviews.text: These came very fast and are a great product. Pretty much exactly all the good things the description says about them. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Overmyer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and protection
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and protection. You can't beat this price. If you are wearing a full face mask it will start to fog up the lens. You have to let the lens warm back for it to subside.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Movado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great goggles. We have not had any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Florencia Maceratini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Goggles are excellent. Very clear and anti fog works very well. For $25 you can’t go wrong with these
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Took them to Colorado, and they worked great. comfortable, easy to see through, good field of vision. I even had a guy stop me and ask me where I got them because he wanted a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Watson McKeel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to wear for our ski trip and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Southernbelle

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit very well and warm but either came scratches or got scratched the first time I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Raistlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality, breathable , very clean vision, cant wait to use them 😊
customer_reviews.author: leon sopi

customer_reviews.title: these goggles are great and had a good fit with my helmet
customer_reviews.text: these goggles are great and had a good fit with my helmet,my vision on the slope was great wearing them,
customer_reviews.author: Alexander B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles. Fit well with a helmet and provide good vision. I received a discount for this product for writing a review of it.
customer_reviews.author: C K

customer_reviews.title: Look Pretty Good But Came With a Scuff
customer_reviews.text: it looks very well made but mine came with a slight defect as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Aizat F.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for our annual Christmas trip to Aspen. The pair he previously had claimed to be anti-fog but kept fogging up on him. I finally decided to get him a new pair. He loved these! They fit great. The anti-fog worked like a charm. And he loved that they were nice and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: lanie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They look great and fit great! I especially like the case, it's sturdy and practical
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on the picture, but not comfortable on the face. Pushing onto nose and visibility area is not great at all. Strap is not long enough. I have regular face size and head size 58 and longest strap size is making googles too tight onto face. Did not have a chance to ski yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles for fair price
customer_reviews.text: Rey good looking goggles, used it last three days skiing; good visibility all around, very little fogging, fits over my regular eyeglasses very well. Of course you can scratch it, there is no such thing as scratch-proof in plastic optics but overall very pleased. The only inconvenience theat this goggles sit fairly low on a nose if you wear a helmet, the deeper nose notch would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: doclenny

customer_reviews.title: used it skiing in in low temperature in Colorado my ...
customer_reviews.text: used it skiing in in low temperature in Colorado my glasses did fog up a little but the goggled did not goggles didn't fog without wearing the glasses since my glasses are progressive lenses and I use them mostly for reading the goggles performed very well for me
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly over my glasses . I could tell my glasses were underneath. The tint of the giggle was also perfect for my light blue eyes against the bright sun and reflects off the snow! Love the case as well!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: Too COOL
customer_reviews.text: Does everything the seller said it will! rest on the face like a dream and it makes you look like a weird cyborg ninja!
customer_reviews.author: moon

customer_reviews.title: I wanted the sweet matte opaque look
customer_reviews.text: This product looks NOTHING as advertised. I wanted the sweet matte opaque look, only reason why i got these pair. Theyre regular looking goggles. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shasmir Coria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice goggles but have not been able to use yet. Comes with a great case to keep them nice.
customer_reviews.author: WILL PERRY

customer_reviews.title: which is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They fit over sunglasses and regular glasses, which is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They are not high quality and they fog up too easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gonex OTG Ski Goggles, Oversized Snow Snowboard Goggles Anti-Fog UV Protection with Box for Men & Women
feature_bullets: **Not Matte Black. It may look like Matte Black goggles in different light intensity , but in fact it is not Matte Black. Thanks for your understanding.**【OTG (Over The Glasses) Design】: Flexible urethane TPU frame construction provides big inner space for your prescription glasses.
【Great Helmet Compatibility】: Adjustable elastic strap ensures great helmet compatibility with all ski & snowboard helmets.
【Anti Fog& UV Protection】: The lenses are anti-fog coated and offer 100% UV400 protection.

【Spherical Frameless Ventilated Dual Lenses】: Design of spherical frameless lenses provide you with an ultra clear wide view. The dual lenses with ventilation system and anti-fog treatment can enhance the air-flow and reduce fogging while keep your eyes in warm condition.

【100% SATISFACTION& MONEY BACK GUARANTEE】: Please feel free to contact us whenever you need help with the item. We guarantee 30 days return and money back, 1 year warranty and lifetime customer service.
